thread.title: Beloved Actress Geena Davis Visits Walt Disney World Resort
thread.title_full: Beloved Actress Geena Davis Visits Walt Disney World Resort

author: Anne Macklin
title: Beloved Actress Geena Davis Visits Walt Disney World Resort
text:
Actress, producer, and writer Geena Davis, takes her family on a surprise winter vacation to Walt Disney World Resort in Orlando, Florida.
Geena, the mother of two tween boys, spent a majority of her time on the big thrill ride attractions including Big Thunder Mountain Railroad at Magic Kingdom Park . A big change of pace from the Disney classics like “ it’s a small world ” when they were little. Geena was able to sneak in a little one on one time with Minnie Mouse, though!

Special thank you to Chloe Rice for the great photos.
